messages.message:
I'm discovering that webpack on both my local and on my sandbox are both facing the same issue. Whenever it tries to load a bundle, it gives a 502 Bad Gateway
https://crafting-aihub--weimingwu-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/
Does anyone know how to fix this, or know of a known good commit that I can branch off of to bypass this issue?
@mfichman I know you've been tinkering around with webpack and server-nginx?
I'm on latest master and am also seeing this - @Weiming Wu were you able to resolve this?

I see a bunch of errors in nginx: `2024/10/21 19:36:54 [crit] 19#19: *30 SSL_do_handshake() failed (SSL: error:0A0000C6:SSL routines::packet length too long error:0A000139:SSL routines::record layer failure) while SSL handshaking to upstream, client: 10.253.24.133, server: , request: "GET /static/output/ibapp_aihub.bundle.js?v=1729497955.0430312 HTTP/1.1", upstream: "https://169.254.16.1:8081/static/output/ibapp_aihub.bundle.js?v=1729497955.0430312", host: "crafting-aihub--jessica-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run", referrer: "https://crafting-aihub--jessica-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/"`
I wasnâ€™t able to connect with weiming. Can I help?
That would be great! I'll send a zoom
@Weiming Wu Jessica had the same problem as you -- we were able to resolve it by rebuilding the sandbox & updating the base image!
